name: 神话纪元 / Titan Siege
description:
"Titan Siege" is the use of XEngine, is a self-developed full 3D engine, the whole world seamless, the game screen as a whole aesthetic, realistic, the game emphasizes the hardcore battle, smooth action, straightforward sense of combat, for the players to create A real 3D world.

"Titan Siege" can be swimming and flight to any location; game support next generation technology, using a large number of delay technology to support the dynamic light and shadow, volume lighting, with far away visual effects and almost realistic picture. In addition to the traditional fixed copy of the game, pet fighting, siege war, but also provides a random copy of the characteristics of the players in the process of Daguai, will randomly start a copy of the region entrance, into a mysterious world. In the Boss war, the cooperation and assistance of various occupations also require a higher, need to work together to complete the challenge.

"Titan Siege" to the Western mythology for the historical background, the Nordic, Greece and many other ancient myths into one, about the gods between the ruling and the destruction of the struggle between. The game to overthrow the myth of the traditional idea of ​​the game to "human on the gods of the inverse" as the main idea, the player to the role of mercenaries into the game, after the destruction of the use of the gods and then wake up, On the human nature of the disaster to kill the road!

In the "Titan Siege", the player can play a worldly traveler, wealthy businessmen, mysterious props collectors, legendary savior, and even NPC leader, or evil devil, where to go The way is entirely chosen by the player.
